room_title: Escape room "The Patient" by Mindscape in Atlanta
room_description: Your police department got a distress call from a doctor at a remote prisoner hospital outside of town. An upcoming storm forced them to relocate the patients out of the facility, but one of the inmates managed to escape! The call ended abruptly and you can sense something terrible is going to happen unless you try to help the doctor. Will you be able to unravel the mystery of the patient's identity and escape with your sanity?
